title.value: Technical-economic aspects of application of threshing device with elastic combs in production conditions
Технико-экономические аспекты применения обмолачивающего устройства с эластичными гребенками в производственных условиях

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Levkin, M.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents analysis of technical and economic aspects of device threshing the flax band with elastic combs in field conditions. Conducted research shows that it is necessary to change the method of separation of seed boxes and to reduce the price of flax heap processing. It will make possible the use of more productive flax-harvesting machines, which guarantee output of high-quality produce with lower material expenses. The cost of machines can be significantly reduced due to cheapening new working organs, which ensure performance according to new technologies
